author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL THREAT TO CONTINUE ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE MISSISSIPPI DELTA, ALABAMA, WESTERN GEORGIA, AND THE FLORIDA PANHANDLE...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL THREAT TO CONTINUE ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE MISSISSIPPI DELTA, ALABAMA, WESTERN GEORGIA, AND THE FLORIDA PANHANDLE...
 As of 10:00 PM CDT Thu Sep 12
 the center of Francine was located near 35.2, -90.9
 with movement NW at 6 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 998 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Francine (AT1/AL062024)
